definition: Professor Ibrahim Gambari (1944-), Nigerian scholar and diplomat, ambassador to UN 1990-1999, UN envoy to Burma from 2007
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sweet/willing
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Li (surname)

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Vice Foreign Minister Wang Yi also met with Mr. Gambari this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午，王毅副部長也會見了甘巴里先生。

sentences.english: China supports the mediation work of Mr. Gambari and the UN Secretary-General.
sentences.chinese: 中國支持聯合國祕書長以及甘巴里先生的斡旋努力。

sentences.english: Gambari notes Beijing's constructive contribution to mediation on the issue.
sentences.chinese: 甘巴里注意到北京在斡旋過程中具有建設性的貢獻。

definition: Chinese name for African kingdom in Somalia, cf Mogadishu 摩加迪沙
old Chinese name for Hormuz/now called 霍爾木茲|霍尔木兹
old Chinese name for Calicut, town on Arabian sea in Kerala, India/now called 卡利卡特

Taurus mountains of south Turkey
Agia Napa, Cyprus/Ayia Napa, Cyprus

Arakan Yoma, mountain range in western Myanmar (Burma)
Arafura Sea

definition: Karakhan Dynasty of central Asia, 8th-10th century
